ac1.author: Larry Chaffin
ac1.comments: Metadata describes how and when and by whom a particular set of data was collected, and how the data is formatted.

a.CCI-000002: The organization disseminates the access control policy to organization-defined personnel or roles.

b1.CCI-000003: The organization reviews and updates the access control policy in accordance with organization-defined frequency.

b2.CCI-000006: The organization reviews and updates the access control procedures in accordance with organization-defined frequency.

ac2.author: Larry Chaffin
ac2.comments: Metadata describes how and when and by whom a particular set of data was collected, and how the data is formatted.

a.CCI-000007:
The organization manages information system accounts by identifying 
account types (i.e., individual, group, system, application, 
guest/anonymous, and temporary).

e.CCI-000010:
The organization requires approvals by organization-defined personnel or
 roles for requests to create information system accounts.

j.CCI-000012:
The organization reviews information system accounts for compliance with
 account management requirements per organization-defined frequency.
